data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Pinus mughus (Krummholz pine) from sample PERCH-71

Exposition NW, Slope 20 deg, Geology: Granit, Grobblock, Tree line 2300 m, av. Tree height 10 m, Tree cover 60%, Herb cover 90%, Moss cover 50%, Vegatation type: Rhododendro ferruginei-Pinetum uncinatae, Film number: 483A
